column1: Media Luna (Spanish pronunciation: [ˈmeðja luna]) is a town and municipality in the Granma Province of Cuba. It is located on the coastal region of the province

column2: the municipality of Media Luna had a population of 35
column3: 330. With a total area of 376 km2 (145 sq mi)
column4: it has a population density of 94.0/km2 (243/sq mi).

column1: The town is crossed by the state highway "Circuito Sur de Oriente" (CSO).
